title: FormArray
contents:
API > @angular/forms
mode_edit code

FormArraylink

追蹤 FormControl、FormGroup 或 FormArray 例項的陣列的值和有效狀態。

Tracks the value and validity state of an array of FormControl, FormGroup or FormArray instances.

檢視"說明"...

class FormArray<TControl extends AbstractControl<any> = any> extends AbstractControl<ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormArrayValue<TControl>, any>, ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, ɵFormArrayRawValue<TControl>, any>> { constructor(controls: TControl[], validatorOrOpts?: ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidator?: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]) controls: ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, Array<TControl>, Array<AbstractControl<any>>> length: number at(index: number): ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, TControl, AbstractControl<any>> push(control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void insert(index: number, control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void removeAt(index: number, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setControl(index: number, control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵRawValue<TControl>[]>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void patchValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void reset(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>> = [], options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void getRawValue(): ɵFormArrayRawValue<TControl> clear(options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void // 繼承自 forms/AbstractControl constructor(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]) value: TValue validator: ValidatorFn | null asyncValidator: AsyncValidatorFn | null parent: FormGroup | FormArray | null status: FormControlStatus valid: boolean invalid: boolean pending: boolean disabled: boolean enabled: boolean errors: ValidationErrors | null pristine: boolean dirty: boolean touched: boolean untouched: boolean valueChanges: Observable<TValue> statusChanges: Observable<FormControlStatus> updateOn: FormHooks root: AbstractControl setValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void setAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void addValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void addAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void removeValidators(validators: ValidatorFn | ValidatorFn[]): void removeAsyncValidators(validators: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]): void hasValidator(validator: ValidatorFn): boolean hasAsyncValidator(validator: AsyncValidatorFn): boolean clearValidators(): void clearAsyncValidators(): void markAsTouched(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAllAsTouched(): void markAsUntouched(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsDirty(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsPristine(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; } = {}): void markAsPending(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void disable(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void enable(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setParent(parent: FormGroup<any> | FormArray<any>): void abstract setValue(value: TRawValue, options?: Object): void abstract patchValue(value: TValue, options?: Object): void abstract reset(value?: TValue, options?: Object): void getRawValue(): any updateValueAndValidity(opts: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void setErrors(errors: ValidationErrors, opts: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void get<P extends string | ((string | number)[])>(path: P): AbstractControl<ɵGetProperty<TRawValue, P>> | null getError(errorCode: string, path?: string | (string | number)[]): any hasError(errorCode: string, path?: string | (string | number)[]): boolean }

說明link

FormArray 每個子 FormControl 的值聚合到一個數組中。它透過減少其子項的狀態值來計算其狀態。例如，如果 FormArray 中的控制項之一無效，則整個陣列將變得無效。

A FormArray aggregates the values of each child FormControl into an array. It calculates its status by reducing the status values of its children. For example, if one of the controls in a FormArray is invalid, the entire array becomes invalid.

FormArray 接受一個通用引數，即內部控制項的型別。如果需要異構陣列，請使用 UntypedFormArray 。

FormArray accepts one generic argument, which is the type of the controls inside. If you need a heterogenous array, use UntypedFormArray.

FormArray 是用於在 Angular 中定義表單的四個基本建構塊之一，與 FormControl、FormGroup 和 FormRecord。

FormArray is one of the four fundamental building blocks used to define forms in Angular, along with FormControl, FormGroup, and FormRecord.

Further information is available in the Usage Notes...

建構函式link

建立一個新的 FormArray 例項。

Creates a new FormArray instance.

This class is "final" and should not be extended. See the public API notes.

constructor(controls: TControl[], validatorOrOpts?: ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[], asyncValidator?: AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[])
引數
controls TControl[]

子控制項的陣列。每個子控制項都會被賦予一個註冊它的索引。

An array of child controls. Each child control is given an index where it is registered.
validatorOrOpts ValidatorFn | AbstractControlOptions | ValidatorFn[]

同步驗證器函式，或此類函式的陣列，或包含驗證函式和驗證觸發器的 AbstractControlOptions 物件。

可選值。預設值為 undefined。

A synchronous validator function, or an array of such functions, or an AbstractControlOptions object that contains validation functions and a validation trigger.
asyncValidator AsyncValidatorFn | AsyncValidatorFn[]

單個非同步驗證器或非同步驗證器函式陣列

可選值。預設值為 undefined。

A single async validator or array of async validator functions

屬性link

屬性 說明
controls: ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, Array<TControl>, Array<AbstractControl<any>>>
length: number 唯讀

控制項陣列的長度。

Length of the control array.

方法link

at()link

mode_edit code

獲取陣列中給定 index 處的 AbstractControl。

Get the AbstractControl at the given index in the array.
at(index: number): ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, TControl, AbstractControl<any>>
引數
index number

要檢索控制項的陣列中的索引。如果 index 為負數，它將從後面迴繞，如果 index 為大大負數（小於 -length），則結果是未定義的。此行為與 Array.at(index) 相同。

Index in the array to retrieve the control. If index is negative, it will wrap around from the back, and if index is greatly negative (less than -length), the result is undefined. This behavior is the same as Array.at(index).
返回值

ɵTypedOrUntyped<TControl, TControl, AbstractControl<any>>

push()link

mode_edit code

在陣列的末尾插入一個新的 AbstractControl。

Insert a new AbstractControl at the end of the array.
push(control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
control TControl

要插入的表單控制項

Form control to be inserted
options object

指定此 FormArray 例項是否應在新增新控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormArray instance should emit events after a new control is added.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或不提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件在插入控制項時會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is inserted. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

insert()link

mode_edit code

在陣列中的給定 index 處插入新的 AbstractControl。

Insert a new AbstractControl at the given index in the array.
insert(index: number, control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
index number

要插入控制項的陣列中的索引。如果 index 為負數，則從後面環繞。如果 index 為很大的負數（小於 -length），則新增到陣列。此行為與 Array.splice(index, 0, control) 相同。

Index in the array to insert the control. If index is negative, wraps around from the back. If index is greatly negative (less than -length), prepends to the array. This behavior is the same as Array.splice(index, 0, control).
control TControl

要插入的表單控制項

Form control to be inserted
options object

指定此 FormArray 例項是否應在插入新控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormArray instance should emit events after a new control is inserted.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或不提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件在插入控制項時會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is inserted. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

removeAt()link

mode_edit code

刪除陣列中給定 index 處的控制項。

Remove the control at the given index in the array.
removeAt(index: number, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
index number

要刪除控制項的陣列中的索引。如果 index 為負數，則從後面環繞。如果 index 為大大負數（小於 -length），則刪除第一個元素。此行為與 Array.splice(index, 1) 相同。

Index in the array to remove the control. If index is negative, wraps around from the back. If index is greatly negative (less than -length), removes the first element. This behavior is the same as Array.splice(index, 1).
options object

指定此 FormArray 例項是否應在刪除控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormArray instance should emit events after a control is removed.

  • emitEvent：當為 true 或不提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在刪除控制項時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is removed. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

setControl()link

mode_edit code

替換現有的控制項。

Replace an existing control.
setControl(index: number, control: TControl, options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
index number

要替換控制項的陣列中的索引。如果 index 為負數，則從後面環繞。如果 index 為很大的負數（小於 -length），則替換第一個元素。此行為與 Array.splice(index, 1, control) 相同。

Index in the array to replace the control. If index is negative, wraps around from the back. If index is greatly negative (less than -length), replaces the first element. This behavior is the same as Array.splice(index, 1, control).
control TControl

替換現有控制項的 AbstractControl 控制項

The AbstractControl control to replace the existing control
options object

指定在將現有控制項替換為新控制項後此 FormArray 例項是否應發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormArray instance should emit events after an existing control is replaced with a new one.

  • emitEvent：當為 true 或不提供（預設）時，當控制項被替換為新控制項時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件都會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is replaced with a new one. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

setValue()link

mode_edit code

設定 FormArray 的值。它接受與控制項結構匹配的陣列。

Sets the value of the FormArray. It accepts an array that matches the structure of the control.
setValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵRawValue<TControl>[]>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵRawValue<TControl>[]>

控制項的值陣列

Array of values for the controls
options object

配置用於確定控制項如何傳播更改並在值更改後發出事件的選項

Configure options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value changes

  • onlySelf：當為 true 時，每次更改隻影響此控制項，而不影響其父控制項。預設為 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或未提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在更新控制項值時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。配置選項會傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control value is updated. When false, no events are emitted. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

此方法會執行嚴格檢查，如果你嘗試設定不存在的控制項的值或者排除控制項的值，則會丟擲錯誤。

This method performs strict checks, and throws an error if you try to set the value of a control that doesn't exist or if you exclude the value of a control.

使用說明link

在表單陣列中設定控制項的值link
Set the values for the controls in the form arraylink
const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl(), new FormControl() ]); console.log(arr.value); // [null, null] arr.setValue(['Nancy', 'Drew']); console.log(arr.value); // ['Nancy', 'Drew']

patchValue()link

mode_edit code

修補 FormArray 的值。它接受與控制項結構匹配的陣列，並盡力將值與組中的正確控制項匹配。

Patches the value of the FormArray. It accepts an array that matches the structure of the control, and does its best to match the values to the correct controls in the group.
patchValue(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>, options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>

控制項的最新值陣列

Array of latest values for the controls
options object

配置用於確定控制項如何傳播更改並在值更改後發出事件的選項

Configure options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value changes

  • onlySelf：當為 true 時，每次更改隻影響此控制項，而不影響其父控制項。預設為 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent：當為 true 或不提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在更新控制項值時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。配置選項會傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control value is updated. When false, no events are emitted. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

它接受陣列的超集和子集，而不會丟擲錯誤。

It accepts both super-sets and sub-sets of the array without throwing an error.

使用說明link

修補表單陣列中控制項的值link
Patch the values for controls in a form arraylink
const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl(), new FormControl() ]); console.log(arr.value); // [null, null] arr.patchValue(['Nancy']); console.log(arr.value); // ['Nancy', null]

reset()link

mode_edit code

重置 FormArray，並把所有後代標記為 pristine 和 untouched，並將所有後代的值對映為 null 或 null。

Resets the FormArray and all descendants are marked pristine and untouched, and the value of all descendants to null or null maps.
reset(value: ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>> = [], options: { onlySelf?: boolean; emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
value ɵIsAny<TControl, any, ɵIsAny<TControl, any[], ɵValue<TControl>[]>>

控制項的值陣列

可選值。預設值為 []。

Array of values for the controls
options object

配置用於確定控制項如何傳播更改並在值更改後發出事件的選項

Configure options that determine how the control propagates changes and emits events after the value changes

  • onlySelf：當為 true 時，每次更改隻影響此控制項，而不影響其父控制項。預設為 false。

    onlySelf: When true, each change only affects this control, and not its parent. Default is false.

  • emitEvent：當 true 或未提供（預設）時，statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件會在控制項重置時發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。配置選項會傳遞給 updateValueAndValidity 方法。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when the control is reset. When false, no events are emitted. The configuration options are passed to the updateValueAndValidity method.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

你透過傳入與控制項結構匹配的狀態陣列來重置為特定的表單狀態。狀態是獨立值或具有值和禁用狀態的表單狀態物件。

You reset to a specific form state by passing in an array of states that matches the structure of the control. The state is a standalone value or a form state object with both a value and a disabled status.

使用說明link

重置表單陣列中的值link
Reset the values in a form arraylink
const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl(), new FormControl() ]); arr.reset(['name', 'last name']); console.log(arr.value); // ['name', 'last name']
重置表單陣列中的值和第一個控制項的禁用狀態link
Reset the values in a form array and the disabled status for the first controllink
arr.reset([ {value: 'name', disabled: true}, 'last' ]); console.log(arr.value); // ['last'] console.log(arr.at(0).status); // 'DISABLED'

getRawValue()link

mode_edit code

陣列的聚合值，包括任何禁用的控制項。

The aggregate value of the array, including any disabled controls.
getRawValue(): ɵFormArrayRawValue<TControl>
引數

沒有引數。

返回值

ɵFormArrayRawValue<TControl>

無論禁用狀態如何，都會報告所有值。

Reports all values regardless of disabled status.

clear()link

mode_edit code

刪除 FormArray 中的所有控制項。

Remove all controls in the FormArray.
clear(options: { emitEvent?: boolean; } = {}): void
引數
options object

指定此 FormArray 例項是否應在刪除所有控制項後發出事件。

Specifies whether this FormArray instance should emit events after all controls are removed.

  • emitEvent：當為 true 或未提供（預設）時，當刪除此 FormArray 例項中的所有控制項時， statusChanges 和 valueChanges 可觀察物件都會發出具有最新狀態和值的事件。當 false 時，不會發出事件。

    emitEvent: When true or not supplied (the default), both the statusChanges and valueChanges observables emit events with the latest status and value when all controls in this FormArray instance are removed. When false, no events are emitted.

可選值。預設值為 {}。
返回值

void

使用說明link

從 FormArray 中刪除所有元素link
Remove all elements from a FormArraylink
const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl(), new FormControl() ]); console.log(arr.length); // 2 arr.clear(); console.log(arr.length); // 0

這是一種比一個一個刪除所有元素更簡單、更高效的替代方案：

It's a simpler and more efficient alternative to removing all elements one by one:

const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl(), new FormControl() ]); while (arr.length) { arr.removeAt(0); }

使用說明link

建立一個表單控制項陣列link

Create an array of form controlslink

const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl('Nancy', Validators.minLength(2)), new FormControl('Drew'), ]); console.log(arr.value); // ['Nancy', 'Drew'] console.log(arr.status); // 'VALID'

建立帶有陣列級驗證器的表單陣列link

Create a form array with array-level validatorslink

你包括陣列級驗證器和非同步驗證器。當你要執行考慮多個子控制項的值的驗證時，它們會派上用場。

You include array-level validators and async validators. These come in handy when you want to perform validation that considers the value of more than one child control.

這兩種型別的驗證器分別作為第二個和第三個 arg 單獨傳入，或作為 options 物件的一部分一起傳入。

The two types of validators are passed in separately as the second and third arg respectively, or together as part of an options object.

const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl('Nancy'), new FormControl('Drew') ], {validators: myValidator, asyncValidators: myAsyncValidator});

為表單陣列中的所有控制項設定 updateOn 屬性link

Set the updateOn property for all controls in a form arraylink

options 物件用於為每個子控制項的 updateOn 屬性設定預設值。如果你在陣列級別將 updateOn 設定為 'blur'，則所有子控制項預設為 'blur'，除非子項顯式指定不同的 updateOn 值。

The options object is used to set a default value for each child control's updateOn property. If you set updateOn to 'blur' at the array level, all child controls default to 'blur', unless the child has explicitly specified a different updateOn value.

const arr = new FormArray([ new FormControl() ], {updateOn: 'blur'});

在表單陣列中新增或刪除控制項link

Adding or removing controls from a form arraylink

要更改陣列中的控制項，請使用 FormArray 本身中的 push、insert、removeAt 或 clear 方法。這些方法可確保在表單的層次結構中正確追蹤控制項。不要修改用於直接例項化 FormArray 的 AbstractControl 陣列，因為這會導致奇怪和意外的行為，例如破損的變更檢測。

To change the controls in the array, use the push, insert, removeAt or clear methods in FormArray itself. These methods ensure the controls are properly tracked in the form's hierarchy. Do not modify the array of AbstractControls used to instantiate the FormArray directly, as that result in strange and unexpected behavior such as broken change detection.
